detail: 用深度强化学习框架替代原有的表达树构建方法
problem_addressed: 表达树构建方法在面对大量数量时效率低下且准确性不足
evidence: In this paper, we make the first attempt of applying deep reinforcement learning as a general framework to solve math word problems. The motivation is that deep Q-network has witnessed success in solving various problems with big search space.
